submission:
import math
class Solution:
    def waysToReachStair(self, k: int) -> int:
        if k == 0: return 2
        elif k == 1: return 4
        k -= 1
        i, cum = 0, 0
        ans = 0
        while cum - k <= i + 1:
            i += 1
            cum = (1 << i) - 1
            #print('i =', i)
            #print('cum =', cum)
            if 0 <= cum - k <= i + 1:
                #print(math.comb(i + 1, cum - k))
                ans += math.comb(i + 1, cum - k)
                #print('ans =', ans)
        return ans
